dict.string: if [[ ! -f "$TM_NEW_FILE" ]]; then TM_YEAR=`date +%Y` \ TM_DATE=`date +%Y-%m-%d` \ TM_USERNAME=`niutil -readprop / /users/\$USER realname` \ NAMESPACE = `python -c "import sys; print sys.argv[1].split('source/class')[1][1:].replace('/', '.')" "$TM_NEW_FILE_BASENAME"` \ echo $NAMESPACE fi
